text: The Opel Astra is a car produced by the German carmaker Opel since 1991. The name was first used by Vauxhall in 1980. It has been sold in the US under the Saturn (2007-2009) and Buick (2009-2015) brand. Under Saturn it kept its original name, while under Buick it was sold as the Verano. ==Versions== File:Opel Astra F front 20081229.jpg|First generation (F) File:Opel Astra G front 20081128.jpg|Second generation (G) File:Opel Astra H Facelift front.JPG|Third generation (H) File:Opel Astra J front 20100725.jpg|Fourth generation () File:Opel Astra 1.6 CDTI ecoFLEX Dynamic (K) – Frontansicht, 23.
